Text: Tnx for still seeding this one :-)
how do i burn it to a dvd?? plz help!
Great... this is a good movie!!!, thanks.
Thank you very much for this.  It was great to see it again.

If this is an .iso file then NTI CD & DVD-Maker 7 will recognize it. All I do is click on the file after download is complete, it will tell me to insert disc, then it will burn it. NTI is the easiest to use for me.
chossi, if it is a regular file (avi, mkv, etc.) ConvertXtoDVD 4 is my favorite for making DVDs I can play in a regular DVD player. Hope this helps.
